titles.title: A bill to amend title 49, United States Code, to provide that only citizens or nationals of the United States may operate trains within the United States that originate in Mexico.
Protection of American Jobs in Cross-Border Rail Operations With Mexico Act
Protection of American Jobs in Cross-Border Rail Operations With Mexico Act
Protection of American Jobs in Cross-Border Rail Operations With Mexico Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.
